description:
The solution for migrating data between systems 

dbForge Data Pump for SQL Server is an add-in for SSMS that serves to fill SQL Server databases with data from external sources. Also, it handles other tasks of migrating database data. 

The Data Pump tool supports all popular data formats for both import and export, including Excel, TXT, XML, CSV, JSON, MS Access, and others – more than 10 formats. Predefined and customizable templates help the users configure data import and data export routines easily. Routines can be automated through the CLI and run on schedule. 

This tool is a part of the full set of SQL tools or a feature of dbForge Studio for SQL Server. Users can also get this solution separately to implement into SSMS and get this advanced functionality in the familiar interface.
displayName: dbForge Data Pump for SQL Server
summary: The solution for migrating data between systems
author: Devart
